text:
Clue :: Berlin, Germany

Clue is a 20-person, VC-­backed (http://blog.helloclue.com/post/130800083731/clue-announces-7...) startup based in Berlin. Every month, millions of users track data about their bodies in Clue’s iOS and Android apps (http://www.helloclue.com/app.html). With every data point, Clue users gain knowledge about their own health, impact the entire community of Clue users, and advance reproductive healthcare globally.

We believe in sane working hours and a highly collaborative workplace (http://blog.helloclue.com/post/124832436206/think-outside-th...). We like to build stylish products that are grounded in science, yet also playful and emotive for the user (http://blog.helloclue.com/post/131022731001/the-science-of-y...).

Clue is hiring for the following (VISA, ONSITE):

* CTO (https://clue.workable.com/jobs/37322)

* Senior iOS Engineer (https://clue.workable.com/jobs/135172)

* Senior Android Engineer (https://clue.workable.com/jobs/135171)

* Senior Data Scientist (https://clue.workable.com/jobs/101600)

* Backend Engineer (https://clue.workable.com/jobs/109443)

* Project Manager (https://clue.workable.com/jobs/121698)

* Support Lead (https://clue.workable.com/jobs/121695)

Use your superpowers for good. Come to Berlin and play with us!
